sourcesContent:
// Mock data to simulate products from a database.
// This will be replaced with data from your AWS backend later.

export const MOCK_PRODUCTS = [
    {
        id: "prod_1",
        name: "Hydrating Face Serum",
        category: "Skincare",
        description: "A deeply hydrating serum with hyaluronic acid and vitamin C.",
        price: 1999.0,
        imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/400x400/805ad5/ffffff?text=Serum",
    },
    {
        id: "prod_2",
        name: "Gentle Cleansing Balm",
        category: "Cleanser",
        description:
            "A soothing balm that melts away makeup and impurities without stripping the skin.",
        price: 1250.0,
        imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/400x400/4c51bf/ffffff?text=Balm",
    },
    {
        id: "prod_3",
        name: "Daily Sunscreen SPF 50",
        category: "Sun Protection",
        description: "Lightweight, non-greasy broad-spectrum SPF 50 protection.",
        price: 1600.0,
        imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/400x400/38a169/ffffff?text=Sunscreen",
    },
    {
        id: "prod_4",
        name: "Retinol Night Cream",
        category: "Skincare",
        description:
            "An anti-aging night cream to reduce fine lines and improve skin texture.",
        price: 2750.0,
        imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/400x400/d53f8c/ffffff?text=Retinol",
    },
    {
        id: "prod_5",
        name: "Exfoliating Scrub",
        category: "Skincare",
        description:
            "A gentle scrub to remove dead skin cells and reveal a brighter complexion.",
        price: 950.0,
        imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/400x400/a0aec0/ffffff?text=Scrub",
    },
    {
        id: "prod_6",
        name: "Face Mask (Hydrating)",
        category: "Skincare",
        description: "A deep hydrating mask for dry and dull skin.",
        price: 800.0,
        imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/400x400/a0aec0/ffffff?text=Mask",
    },
    {
        id: "prod_7",
        name: "Lip Balm with SPF",
        category: "Sun Protection",
        description: "Moisturizing lip balm with sun protection.",
        price: 450.0,
        imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/400x400/cbd5e0/ffffff?text=Lip+Balm",
    },
    {
        id: "prod_8",
        name: "Eye Cream",
        category: "Skincare",
        description: "Reduces puffiness and dark circles under the eyes.",
        price: 1500.0,
        imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/400x400/718096/ffffff?text=Eye+Cream",
    },
    {
        id: "prod_9",
        name: "Vitamin C Toner",
        category: "Cleanser",
        description: "Refreshing toner that brightens skin and tightens pores.",
        price: 1100.0,
        imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/400x400/f6ad55/ffffff?text=Toner",
    },
    {
        id: "prod_10",
        name: "Charcoal Clay Mask",
        category: "Skincare",
        description: "Detoxifying clay mask that clears impurities and excess oil.",
        price: 1350.0,
        imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/400x400/2d3748/ffffff?text=Clay+Mask",
    },
    {
        id: "prod_11",
        name: "Moisturizing Body Lotion",
        category: "Body Care",
        description: "Nourishing lotion for soft and hydrated skin all day.",
        price: 890.0,
        imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/400x400/f687b3/ffffff?text=Lotion",
    },
    {
        id: "prod_12",
        name: "Hand Cream",
        category: "Body Care",
        description: "Fast-absorbing cream that keeps your hands smooth and moisturized.",
        price: 600.0,
        imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/400x400/ed8936/ffffff?text=Hand+Cream",
    },
    {
        id: "prod_13",
        name: "Soothing Aloe Gel",
        category: "Skincare",
        description: "Multi-purpose aloe gel to calm irritated or sunburned skin.",
        price: 700.0,
        imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/400x400/48bb78/ffffff?text=Aloe+Gel",
    },
    {
        id: "prod_14",
        name: "Foaming Cleanser",
        category: "Cleanser",
        description: "Gentle foaming cleanser suitable for all skin types.",
        price: 950.0,
        imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/400x400/4299e1/ffffff?text=Foam+Cleanser",
    },
    {
        id: "prod_15",
        name: "Anti-Frizz Hair Serum",
        category: "Hair Care",
        description: "Lightweight serum that tames frizz and adds shine.",
        price: 1200.0,
        imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/400x400/9f7aea/ffffff?text=Hair+Serum",
    },
    {
        id: "prod_16",
        name: "Dry Shampoo Spray",
        category: "Hair Care",
        description: "Absorbs excess oil and refreshes hair instantly.",
        price: 850.0,
        imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/400x400/f56565/ffffff?text=Dry+Shampoo",
    },
];
